text: Martin Seamus "Marty" McFly is a fictional character in the Back to the Future trilogy. He is the series' protagonist and is played by actor Michael J. Fox. Marty also appears in the animated series, where he was voiced by David Kaufman. He is friends with Emmett Brown in the series. In the videogame by Telltale Games, he is voiced by A.J Locascio. In 2008, Marty McFly was selected by Empire magazine as the 39th Greatest Movie Character of All Time. Eric Stoltz was originally cast as Marty McFly, but after five weeks of shooting scenes for the first movie, director Robert Zemeckis and executive producer Steven Spielberg chose to re-cast the role to Fox. ==References== Category:Back to the Future characters Category:Fictional American people Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1985 Category:Movie characters Category:Michael J. Fox
title: Marty McFly
